Notes for building wxIFM

Building a Shared version of wxIFM

It is possible to build wxIFM as a DLL (Shared Library) or a static library. DLL builds of wxIFM require that you also be using a DLL version of wxWidgets. To build the DLL version of wxIFM, make sure "WXMAKINGDLL_IFM" is define when building the library source files. To use the DLL version of wxIFM, define "WXUSINGDLL" in your program.

Note:
As of this writing, DLL builds of wxIFM are only officially supported if you are building wxIFM using the provided Visual Studio 2003 project files.
